subject: Please respond to your loan application
body:
Dear Home Owner

Are you still paying too much mortgage interest?. Act now on your loan pre-approval.

You can receive $250,000 for 
$637 per month.

Please respond Right Away.
http://ilook.tw/g8ah

 


Lindsey Black
Finance America


When all think alike, no one is thinking very much.	-Walter Lippmann (1889-1974)
